RTCRtpReceiverGetContributingSources.summary: The getContributingSources() method of the interface returns an array of objects, each corresponding to one CSRC (contributing source) identifier received by the current RTCRtpReceiver in the last ten seconds.
RTCRtpReceiverGetContributingSources.returns:
An array of objects, each describing one of the contributing sources that provided data to the incoming stream in the past ten seconds.
These objects contain the following properties:
